nodes.text: Forzaa was a Zeltron female who worked as a fortune teller in the lower levels of Coruscant. When searching for a lost museum on Level 4, Amilyn Holdo visited Forzaa with Leia Organa, and the fortune teller guided them in the right direction.

Forzaa first appeared in "The Right Wrong Turn," written by Delilah S. Dawson, illustrated by Margaux Saltel, and published in Star Wars Adventures 25 on September 11, 2019. Forzaa's name was not used in the comic, but was written in Aurebesh on a sign.
